name: exultingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very happy way, especially at someone else's defeat or failure: "You see, I told you so!" she yelled exultingly. After months of fighting, the soldiers enjoyed the exultingly triumphant conclusion of the war.
More examplesFewer examplesShe exultingly proclaimed "Justice has been done" when she was acquitted.They just stood there laughing exultingly as I struggled my way painfully up the rock face.They would always bellow out exultingly the words of the chorus of the hymn.
